prehistory.text:
Mysterious Fire.

Welcome to Westhay!

A small village in Somerset, England. It is and had always been a quite place where nothing much interesting was happening until recently.

It is 1965 and people, especially here, in UK are absolutely mad about a very famous band, which was born in England in a town called Swimmingpool, "The Skittles".

Three months ago it was announced that The Skittels would give a concert in Westhay. All were in a state of shock because it was hard to believe that such known and popular

band could ever visit Westhay.

Since there were no concert hall in a village like that, locals started their preparations for the day. It was decided to build a music hall and a hotel attached to it. So in less than a

year everything was ready. The Skittles must have been given their concert on 15 August 1965 but their flight was delayed and they arrived the next day. On the night of 15/16

it was a massive FIRE and both the concert hall and the hotel burn out. After the investigation it was understood that someone had set that fire.

The Skittles have already arrived but now the priority number one is to find WHO DID IT AND WHY.

Did anyone want to kill the Skittles?

Did anyone see anything suspicious?

What secrets does this village keep?
